Package mmj.lang

Interface ProofVerifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
VerifyProofs
public interface ProofVerifier
Interface to proof verification.

Refer to mmj.verify.ProofConstants.java for information about proof parameters and error messages.

    • verifyAllProofs

      void verifyAllProofs(Messages messages, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl)
      Verify all proofs in Statement Table.
      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for output error messages.
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (map).

    • verifyExprRPNAsProof

      VerifyException verifyExprRPNAsProof(Stmt exprRPNStmt)
      Verify grammatical parse RPN as if it were a proof.

      Note: even VarHyp and Syntax Axioms are assigned default RPN's, so this should work -- unless there are errors in the Metamath file, or in the grammar itself.

      Parameters:
      exprRPNStmt - Stmt with RPN to verify.
      Returns:
      String error message if error(s), or null.

    • verifyAllExprRPNAsProofs

      void verifyAllExprRPNAsProofs(Messages messages, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl)
      Verify all Statements' grammatical parse RPNs.

      Note: even VarHyp and Syntax Axioms are assigned default RPN's, so this should work -- unless there are errors in the Metamath file, or in the grammar itself.

      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for output error messages.
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (map).
